release.action: First release
Added RoomType enumerations and a type attribute to Room.
ContextModelVisualizer correctly handles the lists of Users and Devices that are now contained in the Environment.
VisualizerManager enables to start the visualization of context for an existing Environment object.
Dramatically improved the rendering performance.
Reworked the menus of the context visualizer.
More improvements in rendering performance.
Added pop-up menus for mouse-over.
Improved rendering of element IDs
ContextModelVisualizer supports LocalizationTags, including movement and path recording.
Reworked ContextModelVisualizer synchronization between the model observers and the paint method to fix concurrency bugs (dead-locks)
Set SHSCyberLink range [1.3.3,1.3.99].
Added Places as super type of Rooms and added Outdoors as a special Place.
Added Doors between Places.
Door is an ElementWithPosition and has a span Vector defining its size and direction.
Added PhysicalDevices into the metamodel.
Added ControllerFramework code for PhysicalDevices.
Places have a temperature DoubleProperty.
Sensor/actor configuration menu in visualizer.
Updated EMF XPath version to avoid icu version conflict
Added meter reading properties.
Set EMF XPath version range.
Set the containment of the meter readings to true
Added utility methods for easier information retrieval
Renamed PhysicalDevice.isOn to getOnValue
Updated DWR to version 3.0RC1
Renamed PhysicalDevice.on() to turnOn and off() to turnOff to avoid problems with the diagram editor.
Added utility methods for easier information retrieval
Added a new device: Washingmachine
Added DPT9021PowerConsumptionSensorWrapper, a special sensor for DPT9021 data of the EIB bridge. This sensor automatically converts the mA values into Watt (assuming 230V).

Added User.installedAssistants list holding the Assistants installed for the user. Operations installAssistant(String assistantId) and uninstallAssistant(String assistantId) enable to add/remove assistants from this list.
Minor tweaks of DPT9021PowerConsumptionSensorWrapper.
Added connection between assistants to model user notification
Added actors and sensors for the Riedel ventilation.
Added Environment.getPlaceInfos() to retrieve immutable infos about places.
Added the visualization of sub-ServiceContainers to the context visualizer and added notification handling of PhysicalDevices.
Added WashingMachine images in Context visualizer. Rooms are not filtered, if ID equals one of filtered Devices.
Deprecated ControllerFrameworkInitializer.
MPicoSys uses shortTable to determine router id
New ConfigurationProperties for RFIDPhidgets
MPico ignores fingerprint if ConfigurationProperties are missing
Added Domain enumeration to enable the categorization of assistants.
Implemented actors and sensors for the digitalSTROM dss11 API (CeBIT 2011).
Fixed problem with Hex-CardIds and internal interger-Ids
Reduced sysouts in Riedel temperature sensor.
Miele hood power usage sensor reports the consumption of the lamp if no ventilation is detected.
Enhanced the dss11 actors and sensors with nasty workarounds for Java's paranoid SSL certificate handling.

Added timeout between Miele gateway polls in case of exceptions. Otherwise the requests are called immediatelly again, which is fatal for example if the machine has no ip and the request throws an exception instantly.
Improved logging for digitalSTROM.
Fixed concurrency problems with the TumbleDryerSerialConnector.
Fixed conversion of MpicoSys identifiers from shortTable.xml.
Added Vector.copy to create new vectors faster (without synchronization).
Reworked setCoordinates(x, y, z) to acquire the write lock only once and not for each setter.
Moved notifications outside of the write-locked blocks of the setters.
DSS11DevicePowerStatusActor.set(..) is executed asynchronously.
Fixed RFIDLocProvider - avoid multiple concierge calls
Added PhysicalDevice Socket, representing a power socket. It should only be used if the connected physical device is unknown.
Moved ControlPointSingleton to SHSCyberlink and cleaned up its behavior - the control point is closed if there are no observers.
Menu is now tabbed.
Discovery of UPnP services, browsing throughout its results an assignment of one service to a Sensor or Actor of a Device.
Added Window type and Place.windows field, similar to Door.
There was a mistake regarding the readerId
Added explanation for the UPnP discovery frame.
Improved repositioning of elements: they did not jump anymore.
Moving and resizing of Places and its Areas. ElementsWithPosition will be moved also.
DPT9021PowerConsumptionSensorWrapper supports electric current values with a "mA" postfix.
Added moving of doors when moving Places.
Avoided folding of Areas while resizing it.
Adding Doors on Places to Place.elements for moving them with Places.
Fixed missing selection area if span has silly value.
Added moving of containing elements if only one area of a place is moved.
Avoided detaching of elements from other Areas while moving an Area.
Reworekd DPT9021PowerConsumptionSensorWrapper into more generic DPTSensorWrapper which supports all known DPTs.
Modified handling of arriving EIB values. (No implicit conversion from mA to W.)
Implemented support for boolean values at DPTSensorWrapper.
Added support for percentage values at DPTSensorWrapper.
Added Environment.electricityMeterElectricPowerReading.
Added abstract PhysicalDeviceWithProgram, which has a "program" TextProperty and "secondsRemaining" IntegerProperty. Oven, Dishwasher and WashingMachine are PhysicalDeviceWithProgram.
PhysicalDeviceWithProgram.secondsRemaining and Environment.electricityMeterElectricPowerReading are containment references now.
Added Device.modelName and Device.manufacturer.
disabled simultaneous connections to BSH-gateway
Fixed missing sub-Service-Containers on the context menu of the context visualizer.
Corrected sorting of Services in the context visualizer.
Using AbstractSensor- and AbstractActorWrapper from PropertiesModel.
added Meter and MeterReading classes to represent smart meters
implemented Servlet for MeterRead-interface
OSGi-Bundle conforms "Java Me, CDC, Foundation Profile"
Unified Ivistar Sensors and Actors.
Added BlindLevel Actor and Sensor for Ivistar.

release.description: ContextVisualizer development, smart meter update and spring version update
release.action: Added editing of the id via context menu.
Added ContextMenuUtil to provide context menus.
Added visualization for Areas, Doors and Windows on the Environment-Tree.
Added functionality to add/remove Rooms and Outdoors to/from the Environment.
Added functionality to add/remove Areas, Doors and Windows to/from Places.
Added definition modification elements to Environment: addRoom, addOutdoors and removePlace.
Added definition modification elements to Place: addDoor, addWindow, removeDoor, removeWindow.
Added 15-minutes interval requests from smart meter to MeterDataServlet.
Changed version of spring dependency to 2.5.6.

release.description: Added PhysicalSensorDevices, InterfaceKitSensor and definition modification elements
release.action: Fixed handling of Services, ServiceContainers and ConfigurationPropertys at the environment-tree.
Added renderging of Windows.
Removed nodes from environment-tree for elements of type: Device, Area, Vector, Property, Door, Window
Use of the ExecutableElementDialog from MetaEditor to execute actions on ContextModel.
Cascaded context menu if some elements overlap each other.
Added definition modification elements to Environment: addDevice and removeDevice.
Added definition modification elements to Device: addInteractionResource and removeInteractionResource.
Added definition modification elements to PhysicalDevice: addSubDevice and removeSubDevice.
Added id parameter to addDevice and addServiceContainer of Environment.
DragPoints are only displayed if mouse pointer is over (or next to) the specific area.
ExecutableElements with no parameters are executed directly (without further user interaction) from context-menu.
Added menu-elements for discovery of UPnP services to ServiceContainer-context-menu.
Added PhysicalSensorDevices
Implemented PhidgetInterfaceKit-Sensor
Added cleaning of ServiceContainers to EnvironmentImpl.
Closing PhidgetRFIDReader and InterfaceKitSensor properly because they block themselves
Removed unnecessary error listener in PhidgetRFIDReader
Timeout for RFIDReader and InterfacKit added
Replaced MASPAPI dependency with MASP-APIs.
Merged both EnvironmentUtility classes and cleaned up the code.
Use of the specific elements (Object) instead of their IDs to differentiate them at the visualization.
Fixed pointing on areas, only the x and y coordinates are taken into account.
Added editing of origin and span to context menu of areas, to edit the z coordinate.
Moved SingletonTimer to MASP-APIs.
Removed Environment.*reading properties which are replaced with the Meter class.
Removed Place.temperature which is now represented by SensorDevices.
Unified EnvironmentUtility.

Moved all SensorService and ActorService implementation to separate modules so it is easier to assembly a ContextModel OSGi bundle. The sensor/actor modules for each of the connected technologies are separate OSGi bundles, deployable depending on the requirements of the platform.
Removed several unused packages, e.g. ar, persistence, facepos.
Moved all technology-specific classes to their respective driver modules and thus drastically reduced the number of dependencies.
Fixed contains method of AreaImpl, now negative spans are handled correct.
Added password to User, including definition modification element to set it.
Renamed User.password to passwordHash.
Added test class for Area.
Fixed order of operations on EnvironmentImpl.addServiceContainer.
Modified access on gui.Images to static.
Extracted environment tree to EnvironmentTreePanel (including all Node classes).
Fixed creation of ServiceContainers.
Added ServiceDiscoveryFrame to add Services by the ServiceDiscovererManager.
Added optional Place.floor attribute.
Visualization of floors.
Fixed missing visualization at embedded mode.
Added DanglingElementsPanel to visualizer for dangling elements (elements without place).
Added drag-and-drop of elements from DanglingElementsPanel to add them to any place.
Added Inlet-wrapper for Doors and Windows to prepare uniform handling.
Added DefinitionModificationElement Place.setNewFloor.
set scope of OSGi-dependency to provided
Renamed EnvironmentUtility.normalizePlace to fixPlace and added handling of Windows.
Fixed handling of elements when dropped at area.
Added testRemoveDevice to EnvironmentTest.
Fixed concurrent access at EnvironmentImpl.removeDevice.
Added ScrollBar to DanglingElementsPanel.
Fixed assignment of elements to places.
Set position of elements not until it is dropped.
Replaced OSGi dependencies with OSGiUtil [1.0.2,1.0.9].
Minor tweaks of the EnvironmentActivator.
Added set and removal of relation between LocalizationTag and ElementWithPosition or LocalisationProviderProxy.
Fixed rendering position of Pop-Ups and LocalizationTags.
Added missing update of dangling elements if area is resized.
Fixed rendering position of Doors and Windows.
Reworked paint methods of elements.
Added DefinitionModificationElement LocalisationProviderProxy.addTag to add tags to providers.
Added functionality to add/remove tags to/from providers.
Use elements itself for filtering instead of its ids.
Reworked (simplified) paintEnvironment at Visualizer.
Elements are added at clicked location for the pop-up.
Avoided rescaling of visualizer if an area is dragged.
Fixed endless recursion while comparing tree nodes.
Fixed missing removal of LocalizationTags from LocalisationProviderProxy when removing them from Environment.
Fixed missing addProvider at context-menu to add LocalisationProviderProxys to the Environment.
Moved methods to check ids of Services from action listeners to EnvironmentUtility.
Added check for unique ids while adding elements to Environment.
Used Maps from visualizer instead of lists from Environment to avoid deadlocks.
added ModelAPI-Services
fixed dependency-problem..again
Added LampType and Lamp.setNewLampeType.
Fixed LampType literal naming.
Fixed NullPointerException during startup in some cases.
Added WaterStorageTank.
Added HeatingRod.
Switched to GettersSetters 1.1.1.
Added Environment.discoverers reference to ServiceDiscovererProxy elements to enable the discovery of actors and services of an environment.
Migrated ActivityModel into the ContextModel
Added reference for DeviceTool to PhysicalDevice
Fixed wrong models@runtime annotations.
Added Place.getTemperatureAverage as a helper for temperature checks.
JSONModelAPISensor queries initial property value upon start.

Added JSONModelAPIServiceConverter for easy re-directing of context models to a Model-API. The converter can perform a total model conversion and replace all sensors and actors with JSON Model-API sensors and actors pointing to a given Model-API.
DummyValueRegistryJPanel shows variables in alphabetical order.
Fidex missing user popup to inform abount done environemnt fixes.
JSONModelAPIActor and -Sensor report availability correctly, which fixes problem with actor method execution.
Added MeterReading.identifier to identify the readings, at least within the meter. This is needed to generate queries to the meter readings in the JSONModelAPIServiceConverter.
JSONModelAPIServiceConverter can convert models with meter readings correctly.
Added and tweaked logging of JSONModelAPIServiceConverter.
Added MeterReading.identifier to identify the readings, at least within the meter. This is needed to generate queries to the meter readings in the JSONModelAPIServiceConverter.
JSONModelAPIServiceConverter can convert models with meter readings correctly.
Added and tweaked logging of JSONModelAPIServiceConverter.

Updated dependency version range for MetaEditor. This actually brings in some API changes which will make older MASPConcept modules not-compatible. Yet the change does not justify the effort of moving to a next big version 1.4.
Fixed JSONModelAPISensor so it works with newest Model-API client, which is more type safe.
Added ContextModelVisualizerComponent MegaModel component, which starts the context model visualization GUI for each context model passed to it.
Added DummyValueRegistryGUIComponent MegaModel component, which starts the dummy registry GUI.
DummyValueRegistryGUIComponent skips start GUI if running in headless environment with no graphics support.
ContextModelVisualizerComponent skips start GUI if running in headless environment with no graphics support.
Added Environment.name and Environment.description as informative attributes describing the environment.
DummyValueRegistryJPanel indicates newly changed values with green color for five seconds.
Added DummyVariableSynchronizationComponent which synchronizes any Property with a dummy registry variable.
Fixed resizing of dangling elements panel.
Fixed update of floor-tabs when adding a place.
Switching to MASP-APIs-1.1.
